definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: This paper also introduces the dual-speed control system and the realization of the function.
sentences.chinese: 還詳述了雙調速系統，及所實現的功能。

sentences.english: Conveyer's speed may dispose the control mode which the constant speed or may modulate velocity.
sentences.chinese: 輸送機的速度可配置成定速或可調速的控制方式。

sentences.english: Digital control electronic governor can im- prove the idle speed characteristic of the high-speed direct injection diesel engine.
sentences.chinese: 數控電子調速器可改善高速直噴柴油機的怠速特性。

sentences.english: This paper presents a double loop controller for VVVF.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種雙閉環控制變頻調速系統。

sentences.english: The configuration of roller table speed regulation system is emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 着重介紹了輥道調速系統的構成。

sentences.english: Often a stuntman's success depends on careful timing.
sentences.chinese: 通常一個特技人的勝利取決於小心的調速。

sentences.english: The methods were discussed to design the speed governing system of DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 詳細討論了直流電機調速系統的工程設計方法。

sentences.english: Unwinding of jumbo roll is pushed by step-less speed-regulator to stable material tension during unwinding.
sentences.chinese: 原材料放卷配裝無級調速推送，放卷材料張力恆定。

sentences.english: In situations requiring wide range multi-speed DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 在要求寬範圍調速的場合多用直流電動機。

sentences.english: The importance of variable frequency regulating velocity was pointed out on the increasing benefit and economizing energy in the chemi…
sentences.chinese: 指出了變頻調速對化工企業節能增效的重要性。

sentences.english: The alternating current excitation motor (ACEM) is a kind of novel adjustable speed motor by changing frequency.
sentences.chinese: 交流勵磁電動機是一種新穎的變頻調速電動機。

sentences.english: I need to buy car flywheels, please and contact us.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要購買汽車調速輪，請與我們聯繫。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the structure principle and debug method of the axial flow and grout rotation electrohydraulic speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 介紹軸流轉漿式電液調速器的結構原理與調試方法。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the VVVF control method for single phase capacitor motor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹單相電容電機變頻調速的控制方法。

sentences.english: The inspection glass for oil level of main generator engine governor, to be renewed.
sentences.chinese: 主發電機調速器用於檢查油等級的檢查玻璃需要換新。

sentences.english: Using Doubly-fed system in pumping station is a new application domain in China.
sentences.chinese: 雙饋調速系統在泵站上的應用是一個全新的應用領域。
